casebody.data:
CAROLINA FIRST BANK
v.
STARK. No. 369P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2008. Tobias S. Hampson, Raleigh, for Stark. *460Mark P. Henriques, Sarah Motley, Charlotte, for Carolina First Bank.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 660 S.E.2d 641.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of August 2008 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of August 2008."
